# Good Dashboard

* Contributors: Good Bad Taste by Gaby Ferman
* Tags: admin theme, administration, administration theme , bootstrap, color scheme, dashboard
* Version: 1.0.0
* License: GPLv2
* License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

## Description
A Wordpress plugin, made to customize the admin / dashboard & login areas of a website.

## Features
- Add custom dashboard classes
- Add custom CSS style to dashboard
- Add your own logo to the admin bar
- Modify the footer text for the dashboard
- Remove dashboard widgets
- Add admin color scheme and use as default
- Hide other color schemes
- Custom login form
- Hide adminbar on frontpage

## Install
Download, unzip and copy to your plugins folder.

## Changelog

1.0.0

* Let's personalize our dashboard
